requirements.text: The auditor shall have at least 2 years full-time experience in the food or associated industry.
requirements.minimum_acceptable: 2 ans d'expérience à plein temps dans l'industrie alimentaire

requirements.text: Consultancy experience may be recognized for up to 6 months, provided it is equivalent to work experience.
requirements.minimum_acceptable: Expérience de conseil reconnue jusqu'à 6 mois

requirements.text: A degree in a food-related or bioscience discipline, or completion of a higher education course in a related field.
requirements.minimum_acceptable: Diplôme dans domaine alimentaire ou bioscience

requirements.text: Successful completion of a Lead Auditor Course for FSMS or QMS (minimum 40 hours).
Completed HACCP training of at least 16 hours.
Auditors must have completed at least 10 audit days consisting of 5 third-party certification audits covering FSMS, HACCP, and PRP requirements.
requirements.minimum_acceptable: 10 jours d'audit dont 5 audits certification tierce partie

requirements.text: At least 2 audits must be performed under supervision of an FSSC 22000 qualified auditor.
requirements.minimum_acceptable: 2 audits supervisés par auditeur FSSC 22000 qualifié

requirements.text: Auditors specializing in packaging must have a primary qualification in packaging technology.
Training must cover topics like packaging legislation, standards, and safety control.
requirements.minimum_acceptable: Formation couvrant législation, standards et contrôle sécurité

requirements.text: Auditors must complete annual continuing education requirements as specified by the certification body.
Documentation of all continuing education activities must be maintained.
requirements.minimum_acceptable: Documentation des activités de formation continue
